alert.note: Alert for Fayette Ridges; Westmoreland Ridges (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 18 at 3:35PM EST until January 20 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM FRIDAY TO 10 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 6 and 12 inches. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Pennsylvania and northern West Virginia. * WHEN...From 1 AM Friday to 10 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind chills are expected to range from 5 to 10 below zero Friday night into Saturday. Areas across eastern Tucker county could see values as low as 15 below zero.
